YANSHEE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” width=”50%” width_tablet=”59%” width_phone=”100%” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”76px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”#6B6B6B” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_text_color_tablet=”” header_text_color_phone=”#6B6B6B” header_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” header_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

PREPARING FOR CAREER DEVELOPMENT

Yanshee is an ideal educational robot designed to provide the ultimate open-source platform for educators and students to learn,experiment,research,and engage with.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

CONVERGENCE OF
AI AND ROBOT

Standing at nearly 15 inches tall, Yanshee combines an advanced AI interface, a programmable Raspberry Pi card, and a host of sensors and functionalities. All these enable Yanshee to perform tasks on command, test environmental conditions, speak, listen, thoughtfully answer questions, and relay data.

  • Infrared Sensor
  • Color Sensor
  • Ultrasonic Sensor
  • Temperature Sensor
  • Capacitive Sensor
  • Humidity  Sensor
  • Pressure Sensor

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f2f2f2″ custom_padding=”25px||0px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||25px||false|false”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#6B6B6B” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#6B6B6B” text_orientation=”center” header_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_font_size_phone=”” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

RIGOROUS CURRICULUM, ACTIVE-LEARNING ENVIRONMENT

Yanshee’s accompanying curriculum promotes students’ abilities at all levels in preparation for various careers. Educators will be provided with appropriate guidance and support to maximize an investment in this high-tech classroom assistant. Yanshee will add personality, emotion, and real-world connection to robotics and coding, creating a high interest environment for students.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”25px||0px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”25px||25px||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”../../../../../ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/04/Yanshee_03.jpg” title_text=”Yanshee_03″ align=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default” animation_style=”slide”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_color=”off” background_image=”../../../../../ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/04/Yanshee_04.jpg” custom_padding=”25px||0px||false|false” background_color_phone=”#f2f2f2″ background_last_edited=”on|phone” background_enable_color_phone=”on” background_size_tablet=”cover” background_size_phone=”contain” background_position_phone=”top_center”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”150px||497px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”69px||69px||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”180px||50px||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”flip” text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”#6B6B6B” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_text_color_tablet=”” header_text_color_phone=”#6B6B6B” header_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” header_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_font_size_phone=”” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

A CARRIER FOR AI ROBOTIC RESEARCH

By using Yanshee platform, instructors and researchers can stay current with major technical and commercial breakthroughs in programming and applied research. Yanshee can be applied in university AI labs for research and re-development purposes.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_color=”off” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”none” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false” custom_css_main_element=”display: flex;||flex-wrap:wrap;”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”align-self:center;” custom_css_main_element_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_css_main_element_tablet=”order: 2;”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#6B6B6B” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#6B6B6B” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

DIVERSE CODING LANGUAGES

The open source nature of the platform means students can leverage multiple coding languages – including C, C++, Python, Java and Blockly &Scratch– to collaborate and engage with Yanshee.

Python

C/C++

Java

Perl

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_css_main_element_tablet=”order:1;”][et_pb_image src=”../../../../../ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/04/Yanshee_05.jpg” title_text=”Yanshee_05″ _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f2f2f2″ custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”none” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false” custom_css_main_element=”display: flex;||flex-wrap:wrap;”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_css_main_element_tablet=”order:1;”][et_pb_image src=”../../../../../ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/04/Yanshee_06.png” title_text=”Yanshee_06″ _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”align-self:center;” custom_css_main_element_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_css_main_element_tablet=”order: 2;”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#6B6B6B” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#6B6B6B” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

USER-FRIENDLY SOFTWARE

Yanshee APP owns game-like interface and can be used for motion control, Blockly programming, PRP and related learning courses.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_color=”off” custom_padding=”25px||25px||false|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”none” custom_padding=”25px||25px||false|false” animation_style=”fade”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”align-self:center;”][et_pb_blurb image=”../../../../../ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/04/Yanshee_08.png” icon_placement=”left” image_max_width=”60px” _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default” body_font=”|700|||||||” body_text_color=”#6B6B6B” body_line_height=”1.5em” body_font_size_tablet=”” body_font_size_phone=”16px” body_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]
